name: Fists of Furry
description:
Fighting game meant for an arcade machine. Select between playing as a skunk or a cat. Play between to different locations one being Historic Japan and the other being in a Roman Colosseum. A simple yet entertaining game made for a class.

Lead Programmer - Nathan Wentworth

Programmer - Robert Grzechowiak

Artist - Sabrina Velez

Audio - Christopher Berry

Artist - Mattia Sicuro
